status.sessionStorageNote: Session storage only - export to save permanently

save.title: Save Diagram (Current Session Only)
save.warningMessage: This save is temporary and will be lost when you close the browser.
save.warningExport: Use Export File to permanently save your work.

load.title: Load Diagram (Current Session Only)
load.noteMessage: These saves are temporary. Export your diagrams to keep them permanently.
load.noSavedDiagrams: No saved diagrams found in this session

export.title: Export Diagram
export.recommendedMessage: This is the best way to save your work permanently.
export.noteMessage: Exported JSON files can be imported later or shared with others.

ai.title: AI Architecture Generator
ai.promptPlaceholder: e.g., Design a microservices e-commerce platform with user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, payment processing, and order management...
ai.promptHint: Tip: Press Ctrl+Enter to generate. Be specific about services, data flows, and technologies.
ai.example1: Design a microservices e-commerce platform with user auth, product catalog, cart, payment, and order management
ai.example2: Create a CI/CD pipeline architecture with GitHub, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, and monitoring
ai.example3: Design a real-time chat application with WebSocket, message queue, database, and notification service
ai.example4: Build a data pipeline architecture with ingestion, processing, storage, and analytics layers
ai.jsonInputHint: Paste or edit the AI-generated JSON schema here. You can also manually write the JSON following the schema format.
ai.apiKeyNote: Your API key is stored locally in your browser and never sent to our servers.
ai.configSavedNote: Settings are automatically saved to your browser's local storage.
ai.errorEmptyPrompt: Please enter a description of the architecture you want to generate.
ai.errorNoApiKey: Please configure your API key in the Settings tab.
ai.errorGeneration: Failed to generate diagram. Please try again.

alert.diagramExists: A diagram named "{{name}}" already exists in this session. This will overwrite it. Are you sure you want to continue?
alert.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Continue loading?
alert.unsavedChangesExport: You have unsaved changes. Export your diagram first to save it. Continue?
alert.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this diagram?
alert.autoSaveFailed: Storage full! Please use Storage Manager to free up space.
alert.beforeUnload: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
alert.quotaExceeded: Storage quota exceeded. Please export important diagrams and clear some space.
